Parents to Qualify as Christian Teachers.--The work of parents, which means so much, is greatly neglected. Awake, parents, from your spiritual slumber and understand that the very first teaching the child receives is to be given to him by you. You are to teach your little ones to know Christ. This work you must do before Satan sows his seeds in their hearts. Christ calls the children, and they are to be led to Him, educated in habits of 
                                                                           24
industry, neatness, and order. This is the discipline Christ desires them to receive.
